name: Mery Anne
description:
This is the game "Revuelto de Coco" made  for the Málaga and Global Jam from January 2021.

Not recomended for ages under16

-Credits-

Story and Game Design: Alejandro Alarcón Valencia and Amanda Vázquez Molina

Artist: Elena Oreja Fuentes

Prorammer: José Luis Arrojo Abela

Music: José Gutiérrez y Guillermo Vázquez
